Description: IN/JG/RRL/230921/01 - You have failed to ensure that employees liable to disturb asbestos during their work, or who supervises such employees, receives the correct level of information, instruction and training to enable them to carry out their work safely and competently and without risk to themselves or others, in that the employees carrying out refurbishment works, where it is forseeable that Asbestos Containing Materials may become disturbed during their work, had not received Asbestos Awereness training.
